sample.content:
In order to 'Place Two Pictures Side by Side', one can 'Click on “Select Photos” again, then select the second photo you want used' and 'Click on “Select Photos,” then select the first photo you want used'. Which should happen first? 
1. Click on “Select Photos,” then select the first photo you want used.
2. Click on “Select Photos” again, then select the second photo you want used.
sample.name: example_user

sample.content:
In order to 'Divorce in Indiana', one can 'File your initial forms in your county court clerk's office' and 'Serve your spouse'. Which should happen first? 
1. Serve your spouse.
2. File your initial forms in your county court clerk's office.
sample.name: example_user

sample.content:
In order to 'Skewer a Balloon', one can 'Inflate the balloon to two-thirds capacity' and 'Coat the tip of the skewer in oil'. Which should happen first? 
1. Coat the tip of the skewer in oil.
2. Inflate the balloon to two-thirds capacity.
sample.name: example_user
